LanguageData.RWBY_Fulcrum.label: Fulcrum
LanguageData.RWBY_Fulcrum.description: Fulcrum is a greatsword and Yatsuhashi Daichi's weapon of choice. Fulcrum is nearly as tall as normal humans. Because of it's size Falcrum also acts as a shield.
LanguageData.RWBY_Fulcrum.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RWBY_Fulcrum.tools.1.label: edge
